argument.description: The string that will be converted to a number.
Optional. This is the format that will be used to convert string1 to a number.
Optional. This is the nls language used to convert string1 to a number.

returnType: The TO_NUMBER function returns a numeric value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL TO_NUMBER function converts a string to a number.
sample:
TO_NUMBER('1210.73', '9999.99')
Result: 1210.73

TO_NUMBER('546', '999')
Result: 546

TO_NUMBER('23', '99')
Result: 23 TO_NUMBER('1210.73')
Result: 1210.73
